desc.p: The debit movement amount expressed in the original currency of the transaction, identified by field CURRENCY.
Standard Amount format.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Debit amount expressed in the local currency.
Standard Amount format.
Specifies whether the consol entry relates to either a contingent account 'AC' entry or profit and loss 'CP' entry.
The values 'CP' - Contingent Profit & Loss or 'AC' - Contingent Account.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
The Statement entry or Category entry Id of the originating entry that caused this contingent entry to be raised.
Either a Category Entry Id or a Statement Entry Id.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 rate field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
A valid record in FX.POS.TYPE,
"TR" (Trading)
or "IA" (IAS)
The currency of the contingent entry this record relates to.
Standard Currency format.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 5 characters may be entered.
The credit movement amount expressed in the original currency of the transaction, identified by field CURRENCY.
Standard Amount format.
Identifies the originating transaction reference number that caused this contingent entry to be raised.
16 alphanumeric characters representing the contract id of the transaction.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
The currency market of the originating transaction that this entry was created for.
Standard Currency Market format.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the RE.TXN.CODE file.
A maximum of 2 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 customer field.
A maximum of 10 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CUSTOMER file.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 40 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 date field.
A maximum of 11 characters.
The credit amount expressed in local currency.
Standard Amount format.
Standard T24 rate field.
A maximum of 11 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 4 characters may be entered.
Standard T24 date field.
A maximum of 11 characters.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 11 characters.
Key to an entry on the COMPANY file.
Unique key identifying the consol entry.
16 alphanumeric characters.
